description: The style of combatives developed by an arcane order, dedicated to fighting in defense of humanity.  Focuses on preserving momentum and fighting multiple opponents, using their fury in different ways depending on their weapon of choice.  Bladed weapons favor parries and armor penetration, while bludgeons favor evasion and protection.  The full extent of the style requires proper armament and arcane experience.
initiate: You whisper a prayer to the gods, and ready yourself in a fluid stance.  Dii vult!
%s whispers something, entering a fluid stance.

onmove_buffs.name: Hunter's Advance (Hammer)
onmove_buffs.description:
Every step brings confidence.
+1.0 Dodge skill, +2 Dodge attempts.
Lasts 3 turns.

onmove_buffs.name: Hunter's Advance (Sword)
onmove_buffs.description:
Every step brings confidence.
+5 damage blocked, +2 Block attempts.
Lasts 3 turns.

onmove_buffs.name: Hunter's Advance (Unarmed)
onmove_buffs.description:
Every step brings confidence.
+1.0 Dodge skill, +2 Dodge attempts.
Lasts 3 turns.

onattack_buffs.name: Righteous Momentum
onattack_buffs.description:
Your own fury hastens that of your weapon.
+1 Accuracy, -10 move cost.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Battle Ward
onattack_buffs.description:
Against the inhuman, the only defense is vigilance.
+1 heat/cold/electric armor.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

onhit_buffs.name: Prudence (Hammer)
onhit_buffs.description:
With cautious ferocity, no blade may mark you.
+1 bash/cut/stab armor.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

onhit_buffs.name: Pursuit (Sword)
onhit_buffs.description:
Every strike only further illuminates their weakness.
+3 armor penetration.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

onkill_buffs.name: Regain Composure (Hammer)
onkill_buffs.description:
Mortal blows drain the momentum you've built up.
-1 Accuracy, +10 move cost, +1.0 Dodge skill.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

onkill_buffs.name: Regain Composure (Sword)
onkill_buffs.description:
Mortal blows drain the momentum you've built up.
-1 Accuracy, +10 move cost, +5 damage blocked.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

//: To be valid for this style, it must be either a bashing or cutting weapon, one-handed, without the RAPID technique.  Bludgeons must have at least 20 bashing damage and less than 20 cutting damage.  Blades must have at least 20 cutting damage and less than 20 bashing damage.  Inferior versions of weapons are permitted even if they would have less than the required damage.  The lucern hammer variant is only allowed due to being custom made with the martial art's techniques in mind, and could reasonably be used with the same one-handed technique by mutant/cyborg characters.

description: A form of combatives used by the hunters of hunters, high-ranking assassins of an arcane order devoted to blood magic.  Designed with various bladed weapons in mind but also usable unarmed, especially by mutants with claws or with a limited selection of unarmed weapons.  Strength and dexterity improve your abilities but the weak will struggle with it, and arcane knowledge is needed to use the style to the fullest.
initiate: You ready yourself for the trials that await.

onattack_buffs.name: Bloodlust
onattack_buffs.description:
You commit to the offensive.

+1 Accuracy, -1.0 Dodge skill, -1 Dodge attempt.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

onattack_buffs.name: Honed Claws (Unarmed)
onattack_buffs.description:
Empty-handed does not always mean unarmed.

Cut/stab armor penetration increased by 50% of dexterity.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 3 times.
onattack_buffs.//: All unarmed weapons are permitted, but using the tiger claws, bionic claws, or demon claw is recommended since the other buffs and techniques are off-limits to other unarmed weapons.

onattack_buffs.name: Honed Claws (Claws)
onattack_buffs.description:
Empty-handed does not always mean unarmed.

Cut/stab armor penetration increased by 50% of dexterity.
Lasts 2 turns.  Stacks 3 times.
onattack_buffs.//: All unarmed weapons are permitted, but using the tiger claws, bionic claws, or demon claw is recommended since the other buffs and techniques are off-limits to other unarmed weapons.

oncrit_buffs.name: Scavenger
oncrit_buffs.description:
A mortal wound opens an opportunity.  Enables "Sundering Talons" technique.
Cutting and stabbing damage increased by 25% of strength, speed increased by 75% of dexterity, damage blocked reduced by 2, -1 Block attempt.
Lasts 6 turns.  Stacks 2 times.

onkill_buffs.name: Exsanguination
onkill_buffs.description:
Each enemy slain lends power to the next strike.
+1 cold damage per 50% of strength, damage blocked increased by 25% of strength, Dodge Skill increased by 25% of Dexterity, +3 Block and Dodge attempts.
Lasts 6 turns.  Stacks 2 times.

description: Immersed in The Beyond, you have learned to defend against unconventional threats with otherworldly weapons, rewarding high intelligence and perception.  Though not of mortal origin, this art's greatest secrets resonate with specific ritual weapons, destined for their Chosen wielders.
initiate: You focus your will through your weapon.

static_buffs.name: Liminal Stance
static_buffs.description:
Attuning to the ebb and flow of this reality, you more easily avoid threats.

+2 Dodge attempts, Dodge Skill increased by 50% of Intelligence.

onpause_buffs.name: Grounding Focus
onpause_buffs.description:
Turning inward, your elusiveness gives way to resilence.

-2 Dodge attempts, Dodge Skill reduced by 50% of Intelligence, +2 Block attempts, damage blocked increased by 100% of intelligence, bash and electric armor increased by 50% of Intelligence.
Lasts 2 turns.

ongethit_buffs.name: Resurgence
ongethit_buffs.description:
You flow with the impact, and draw upon your enemy's own strength.

Speed increased by 100% of Intelligence.
Lasts 3 turns.

ondodge_buffs.name: Draw Forth
ondodge_buffs.description:
You offer void where the enemy offers strength, and thus unravel their defenses.

Accuracy increased by 50% of intelligence, bash/cut/stab armor penetration increased by 100% of Intelligence.
Lasts 3 turns.

onhit_buffs.name: Unraveling Resonance
onhit_buffs.description:
As you excise the blight on this reality, you turn this release of energy inward.

Speed increased by 50% of Intelligence, Dodge Skill increased by 25% of Intelligence, bash/cut/stab armor increased by 25% of Intelligence.
Lasts 3 turns.
